Summary: 300 yards wide and 3-4 stories tall and blue/green mixture in color and hovered over a plowed field effortlessley
divs: sighting detailsmy father came barreling in from work one afternoon and told my family to walk to the back of the house. he said he had left work because he had seen a huge blimp heading in the general direction of our house\property. my family and i (5 sisters and myself) walked to the back of the house and there over a big plowed field 30-40 feet from the ground was this huge, lumbering, turquoised object. it appeared to be 3-4 stories tall and probably 300 yards in diameter(circular in appearance). the circular object was making a mild humming sound. my family wasn't the only ones to see the ufo. there were cars on both sides of the road as far as the eye could see in both directions of our house. the road runs north and south and visibility was half a mile in either direction. i remember seeing the flash of camera bulbs so someone in our area has pictures. i was probably 4 to 5 years old at the time but i have verified what i've seen with my older sisters. whom tell pretty much the same story. the ufo lumbered overed the field as if it was moving in slow motion and after what seemed to be forever, disappeared out of sight. my father's work place was located on hwy. 11(runs north and south). the object was moving in an easterly direction. he said he saw smaller objects dropping out of the ufo but said the ufo was at a higher altitude when he saw it, at his place of work. our house is 20 miles from oak ridge national laboratories(ornl) and this sighting may have something to do wth the fact of that..... close proximity to a weapons grade facility. i would also like to add that our local newspaper reported the following day that it was a weather balloon. if anyone would like to research the story of the weather ballon they can search the newspaper archives. the newspaper is 'the dailey post athenian'. the time frame would be 1972-1975.
